title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2101 - Maximum Rents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2101 - Maximum Rents

State Regulations
§ 2101.1 - Maximum rents for housing accommodations, except in hotels
§ 2101.2 - Maximum rents for housing accommodations in hotels
§ 2101.3 - Maximum rents for housing accommodations, including equalization adjustment effective May 1, 1953
§ 2101.4 - Maximum rents on and after June 30, 1961 for housing accommodations where rent adjustments were ordered pursuant to section 2102.3(b)(5)
§ 2101.5 - Services included in the maximum rent

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2101

Statutory authority: L. 1950, ch. 250, as amd.; L. 1964, ch. 244; Emergency Housing Rent Control Law, §§ 4[4][a], 12[7]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
